name: Lockdown (Initial version)
description:
[This is an initial version of the game. I want to improve the design and to add more levels, but first want to see what will be the comments to the basic idea]

Your mission is to win Covid-19 by keeping your money and without falling into depression. avoid the police officers while trying to keep your daily life.

Move your player by the arrow keys or by touching the screen

While you're in the pub- your happiness goes up, and while you're at work- your money goes up.

If your mask fall down- you need to collect it before the guy will take it. If he took it- you could buy a new one at the store (it's will cost you $50). The fine on not wearing a mask is $100.

While in lockdown- the officers will try to give you a $300 fine, unless you'll be at home.

If you touched the sick guy- the fine on not being at home will be $500.

Notice that the officer's speed goes faster as the game goes on 

the game will last between 3:00 and 4:00 minutes. your happiness and money have to be positive for winning.

* The game is playable at the mobile, but more comfortable at the computer
